tools.name: Copy Selected Text
tools.description: Copy currently selected text on the page to clipboard - ideal for extracting highlighted content, copying form data, or harvesting visible text selections.

copiedText.description: Text content that was copied from the page selection
copiedText.title: Copied Text

textLength.description: Number of characters in the copied text
textLength.title: Text Length

wasTextSelected.description: Whether text was actually selected and copied
wasTextSelected.title: Was Text Selected

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Drag and Drop
tools.description: Execute precise drag and drop operations - essential for file uploads, list reordering, element moving, and complex UI interactions that require drag-based manipulation.

button.description: Mouse button for drag operation (almost always 'left' for standard drag-drop, 'right' for special contexts)
button.title: Button

endX.description: Ending X coordinate for drop operation (where to release the element)
endX.title: End X

endY.description: Ending Y coordinate for drop operation (where to release the element)
endY.title: End Y

startX.description: Starting X coordinate for drag operation (where to grab the element)
startX.title: Start X

startY.description: Starting Y coordinate for drag operation (where to grab the element)
startY.title: Start Y

dragDistance.description: Total distance and direction of the drag operation
dragDistance.title: Drag Distance

dragType.description: Inferred type of drag operation based on movement pattern
dragType.title: Drag Type

status.description: Execution status of the drag and drop operation
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Fetch Webpage Content
tools.description: DECISION BRAIN: Essential for analysis, planning, and information gathering. PRIMARY USES: Understand page state, locate elements, verify changes, plan next actions FALLBACK ROLE: When screenshot blocked/fails, use this diligently for information FORMAT: html=element discovery & coordinates | markdown=content analysis HYBRID WORKFLOW: Use for decisions → AI agent for precision clicking

format.description: Output format for content (markdown or html)
format.title: Format

idleTtlSec.description: Optional idle TTL for new sessions (seconds)
idleTtlSec.title: Idle Ttl Sec

newPage.description: Whether to create a new page for the content
newPage.title: New Page

returnPartialOnTimeout.description: Whether to return partial content if timeout occurs
returnPartialOnTimeout.title: Return Partial On Timeout

url.description: URL to fetch content from. If not provided, uses current page
url.title: Url

wait.description: Time to wait for dynamic content to load (milliseconds)
wait.title: Wait

content.description: Content of the webpage in requested format
content.title: Content

contentLength.description: Length of the content in characters
contentLength.title: Content Length

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Get Clipboard Content
tools.description: Read current content from the system clipboard - essential for data transfer workflows, extracting copied text, and reading user-copied data for processing.

clipboardContent.description: Text content currently stored in the system clipboard
clipboardContent.title: Clipboard Content

contentLength.description: Number of characters in the clipboard content
contentLength.title: Content Length

hasContent.description: Whether clipboard contains any text content
hasContent.title: Has Content

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Keyboard Shortcut
tools.description: Execute keyboard shortcuts and key combinations - essential for copy/paste, navigation, and application commands that agents need for efficient browser automation.

holdTime.description: Milliseconds to hold keys down (0=quick press like normal shortcuts, 100+=sustained press for special actions)
holdTime.title: Hold Time

keys.description: Array of keys to press simultaneously (e.g., ['Ctrl', 'c'] for copy, ['Alt', 'Tab'] for window switching, ['Ctrl', 'Shift', 'I'] for dev tools)
keys.title: Keys

shortcutType.description: Type of shortcut performed (copy, paste, navigation, etc.)
shortcutType.title: Shortcut Type

status.description: Execution status of the keyboard shortcut
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Mouse Click
tools.description: MANUAL PRECISION: Coordinate-based clicking - less efficient than AI agent for complex clicks. WHEN TO USE: Simple single clicks when you have exact coordinates BETTER ALTERNATIVE: Use PerformWebTask AI agent for complex/precise clicking PATTERN: FetchWebpage(html) → estimate coordinates → click → verify HINTS: Center ~(640,350) | Header ~y=150 | Content ~y=300-500 | SUCCESS RATE: 85%

button.description: Mouse button to use for clicking
button.title: Button

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Mouse Double Click
tools.description: Execute a precise double click at specified screen coordinates - ideal for opening files, selecting text, or activating UI elements that require double click gestures.

button.description: Mouse button for double click action - use 'left' for most UI elements, 'right' for context menus
button.title: Button

x.description: Horizontal pixel position for double click (0 = left edge, increases rightward)
x.title: X

y.description: Vertical pixel position for double click (0 = top edge, increases downward)
y.title: Y

button.description: Mouse button used for the double click
button.title: Button

coordinates.description: Coordinates where double click was executed
coordinates.title: Coordinates

status.description: Execution status of the double click operation
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Mouse Down (Press and Hold)
tools.description: Press and hold mouse button at coordinates - use for starting custom drag operations, text selections, or long-press interactions. Must be followed by MouseUp action to complete.

button.description: Mouse button to press and hold (usually 'left' for selections and drags, 'right' for context menus)
button.title: Button

x.description: X coordinate to press mouse button down (where to start the press-and-hold operation)
x.title: X

y.description: Y coordinate to press mouse button down (where to start the press-and-hold operation)
y.title: Y

button.description: Mouse button that was pressed down
button.title: Button

coordinates.description: Coordinates where mouse button was pressed down
coordinates.title: Coordinates

reminder.description: Reminder about completing the mouse sequence with mouse_up
reminder.title: Reminder

status.description: Execution status of the mouse down operation
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Mouse Move
tools.description: Move mouse cursor to precise coordinates without clicking - perfect for triggering hover effects, revealing tooltips, and positioning for subsequent interactions.

x.description: Target X coordinate for mouse cursor (0 = left edge, increases rightward, typical screen: 0-1440px)
x.title: X

y.description: Target Y coordinate for mouse cursor (0 = top edge, increases downward, typical screen: 0-900px)
y.title: Y

purpose.description: Likely purpose of the mouse movement based on UI interaction patterns
purpose.title: Purpose

status.description: Execution status of the mouse move operation
status.title: Status

targetCoordinates.description: Coordinates where mouse cursor was moved
targetCoordinates.title: Target Coordinates

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Mouse Up (Release Button)
tools.description: Release mouse button at coordinates - completes drag operations, text selections, and long-press interactions. Should be used after MouseDown to finish mouse button sequences.

button.description: Mouse button to release (should match the button used in previous MouseDown action)
button.title: Button

x.description: X coordinate to release mouse button (where to end the press-and-hold operation or complete a drag)
x.title: X

y.description: Y coordinate to release mouse button (where to end the press-and-hold operation or complete a drag)
y.title: Y

coordinates.description: Coordinates where mouse button was released
coordinates.title: Coordinates

operationType.description: Type of operation completed (drag_completion, selection_end, long_press_end)
operationType.title: Operation Type

status.description: Execution status of the mouse up operation
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Navigate to URL
tools.description: SESSION FOUNDATION: Always start here - creates browser session and navigates to URL. WORKFLOW: Navigate() → FetchWebpage() → Analysis/Planning → AI Agent or Manual interactions → Verify PROVIDES: Live debugUrl for user, initial page snapshot, persistent session TIP: Always show debugUrl to user before proceeding

idleTtlSec.description: Optional idle TTL for the session (seconds)
idleTtlSec.title: Idle Ttl Sec

url.description: URL to navigate the cloud browser to
url.title: Url

debugUrl.description: URL to view the browser session, the user can view the session live with this so always show it to them before moving forward
debugUrl.title: Debug Url

pageTitle.description: Title of the page after navigation
pageTitle.title: Page Title

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Paste Text
tools.description: Paste text content at the current cursor position - perfect for filling forms, inserting data into text fields, or quick content insertion at focused elements.

text.description: Text content to paste at current cursor location (form data, URLs, structured content)
text.title: Text

insertionPoint.description: Where the text was inserted (cursor position description)
insertionPoint.title: Insertion Point

pastedText.description: Text content that was pasted into the browser
pastedText.title: Pasted Text

status.description: Execution status of the paste operation
status.title: Status

textLength.description: Number of characters that were pasted
textLength.title: Text Length

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: AI Perform Web Task
tools.description: AI AGENT: BEST for precise clicking and complex interactions. PREFERRED FOR: Button clicks, form interactions, precise targeting (coordinates handled well) HYBRID WORKFLOW: Use after FetchWebpage analysis for informed AI interactions WHEN TO USE: Any clicking task, multi-step workflows, dynamic content STRATEGY: AI handles precision → regular tools for verification

aiAgent.description: AI agent engine to use ('browser-use'=robust multi-step automation, 'openai-cua'=OpenAI-optimized tasks)
aiAgent.title: Ai Agent

aiModel.description: Specific AI model to use ('gpt-5'=latest flagship, 'gpt-5-mini'=efficient flagship, 'gpt-5-nano'=ultra-fast, 'gpt-4o'=advanced OpenAI, 'gpt-4o-mini'=efficient, 'gpt-4.1'=enhanced, 'gpt-4.1-mini'=compact enhanced)
aiModel.title: Ai Model

aiProvider.description: AI provider for task execution ('openai'=GPT models, 'gemini'=Google AI, 'groq'=fast inference, 'azure'=enterprise, 'xai'=experimental)
aiProvider.title: Ai Provider

highlightElements.description: Show visual highlights during task execution for transparency and debugging (True=show interaction highlights, False=hidden execution)
highlightElements.title: Highlight Elements

idleTtlSec.description: Optional idle TTL for new sessions if sessionId not provided (seconds)
idleTtlSec.title: Idle Ttl Sec

outputSchema.description: Optional JSON Schema to structure the output for data extraction tasks (provides structured data instead of text description)
outputSchema.title: Output Schema

prompt.description: Natural language description of the web task to perform autonomously (e.g., 'Log into Gmail and send an email', 'Fill out contact form', 'Find and download the PDF')
prompt.title: Prompt

url.description: Optional URL to perform task on (if not provided, uses current page in existing session)
url.title: Url

aiAgent.description: AI agent that performed the task
aiAgent.title: Ai Agent

aiModel.description: AI model used for task execution
aiModel.title: Ai Model

executionResult.description: Detailed result or outcome of the autonomous web task
executionResult.title: Execution Result

executionTime.description: ISO timestamp when task execution completed
executionTime.title: Execution Time

highlightsUsed.description: Whether visual highlights were shown during execution
highlightsUsed.title: Highlights Used

taskComplexity.description: Assessed complexity of the executed task
taskComplexity.title: Task Complexity

taskPrompt.description: Natural language task that was executed
taskPrompt.title: Task Prompt

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Screenshot Webpage
tools.description: Capture high-quality screenshot of any webpage with extensive customization options - perfect for archiving, visual documentation, full-page captures, and cross-device viewport testing.

captureFullHeight.description: Capture entire page height ignoring viewport (True=full page length, False=viewport height only)
captureFullHeight.title: Capture Full Height

height.description: Browser viewport height in pixels for capture (720=standard, 900=tall desktop, 667=mobile)
height.title: Height

idleTtlSec.description: Optional idle TTL for new sessions if sessionId not provided (seconds)
idleTtlSec.title: Idle Ttl Sec

imageQuality.description: Image quality percentage (100=no compression/max quality, 80=good balance, 50=smaller file size)
imageQuality.title: Image Quality

scrollAllContent.description: Scroll through entire page to capture all content (True=captures everything, False=viewport only)
scrollAllContent.title: Scroll All Content

url.description: URL of the webpage to capture (can be any publicly accessible website)
url.title: Url

wait.description: Milliseconds to wait after page load for JS/animations (1000=default, 3000+=heavy sites, 5000+=very dynamic)
wait.title: Wait

width.description: Browser viewport width in pixels for capture (1280=standard desktop, 1440=large desktop, 375=mobile)
width.title: Width

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Scroll Page
tools.description: PAGE NAVIGATION: Smooth scrolling. USE: When target element not visible after FetchWebpage() DISTANCE: 200px=fine | 400px=sections | 800px=quick traverse ALWAYS: Scroll → FetchWebpage() → verify | SUCCESS RATE: 99%

deltaX.description: Horizontal scroll distance in pixels (positive=scroll right, negative=scroll left, usually 0 for vertical scrolling)
deltaX.title: Delta X

deltaY.description: Vertical scroll distance in pixels (positive=scroll down toward bottom, negative=scroll up toward top, typical range: 100-500px per scroll)
deltaY.title: Delta Y

steps.description: Number of steps to break scroll into for smoothness (1=instant jump, 3-5=smooth animation, 10+=very smooth but slower)
steps.title: Steps

useOs.description: Use OS-level scrolling (True=more reliable, works with all apps) vs browser scrolling (False=web-specific, may fail on some sites)
useOs.title: Use Os

x.description: X coordinate where scroll originates (center of viewport recommended: 640 for 1280px width, 720 for 1440px width)
x.title: X

y.description: Y coordinate where scroll originates (center of viewport recommended: 360 for 720px height, 400 for 800px height)
y.title: Y

coordinates.description: Origin coordinates where scroll was initiated
coordinates.title: Coordinates

scrollDistance.description: Description of scroll distance and smoothness
scrollDistance.title: Scroll Distance

status.description: Execution status of the scroll operation
status.title: Status

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Set Clipboard Content
tools.description: Store text content in the system clipboard for later paste operations - perfect for preparing data transfers, staging content for forms, or cross-application data sharing.

text.description: Text content to store in system clipboard (URLs, data, structured text, form content)
text.title: Text

contentLength.description: Number of characters stored in clipboard
contentLength.title: Content Length

status.description: Execution status of clipboard set operation
status.title: Status

textSet.description: Text content that was stored in clipboard
textSet.title: Text Set

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Take Screenshot
tools.description: VISUAL VERIFICATION: Capture screenshot - MUST BE CALLED ALONE in multi_execute. 🚨 CRITICAL: Screenshot cannot be combined with other tools in same multi_execute call FALLBACK: If screenshot blocked/fails, use FetchWebpage diligently for information USE: Debug UI, verify states, document results after page changes RENDERS: Inline visual feedback | SUCCESS RATE: 99%

content.description: MCP content blocks with inline image
content.title: Content

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Type Text
tools.description: CONTROLLED INPUT: Human-like typing. PATTERN: Click to focus → TypeText() → verify SPEED: delay=0 (fast) | delay=50 (human-like) | delay=100+ (careful) Must focus input field first | SUCCESS RATE: 95%

delay.description: Milliseconds delay between each keystroke for natural human-like typing (0=instant, 50-100=realistic human speed, 200+=slow deliberate typing)
delay.title: Delay

text.description: Text content to type into the browser (supports unicode, special characters, newlines, form data)
text.title: Text

status.description: Execution status of the text typing operation
status.title: Status

textLength.description: Number of characters that were typed
textLength.title: Text Length

typingSpeed.description: Typing speed description based on delay setting
typingSpeed.title: Typing Speed

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful
